title: Add Support for other operator other than AND/ OR in solr query (eg:SAME )
description:
Add Support for other operator other than AND/ OR in solr query (eg:SAME )

comments.author: Uwe Schindler
comments.content: What does "SAME" mean for you? There is no such query in Lucene, so Solr cannot handle this.
